service.name: Sculptra

seo.title: Sculptra® in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Sculptra® (PLLA) stimulates collagen for gradual, natural volume and improved skin quality. Typically 2–3 sessions. Book Westfield or Carmel.

overview.p1: Sculptra® is a collagen stimulator (PLLA) that rebuilds support gradually for natural-looking volume and skin quality.
overview.p2: We map a series (often 2–3 sessions) and coach massage/aftercare so results accrue smoothly over weeks.

whyReluxe.title: Series design
whyReluxe.body: Session timing and vials planned to build steady, believable improvement.

whyReluxe.title: Collagen coaching
whyReluxe.body: Clear massage and follow-up for even results.

whyReluxe.title: Blend & balance
whyReluxe.body: Can combine with HA fillers for shape while Sculptra builds support.

service.tagline: Collagen stimulation for gradual, natural volume.

howItWorks.title: What it is
howItWorks.body: Poly-L-lactic acid stimulates new collagen over time.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: Great for global volume & texture over time.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
